website_summaries.verdict: Easily the most retro games for your money, the Flashback 9 Gold is the ultimate introduction to a number of timeless games like Frogger and Seaquest.
pros: 120 of the best Atari games, including Centipede, Space Invaders, and Pong
cons: Some may not appreciate the minimalist visuals of the Atari era

customer_reviews.title: Controllers won’t pair
customer_reviews.text: I saw the 5 star reviews and thought maybe they had figured out the connection issues for the controllers. The 5 star reviews are either randomly lucky customers or bogus reviews planted by the manufacturer. I tried for 45 minutes to get the controllers to pair with the base unit. Followed the directions from other reviewers as well as the directions in the box. They do not work. I really wanted it to. We were really looking forward to playing some games from our teen years but we’ll just have to live off of the memories.
customer_reviews.author: JP in Fresno

customer_reviews.title: Works but kinda sucks
customer_reviews.text: I got the paddles to connect no problem. Just search the u-tube for 30 seconds and it will make sense. However, once fired up, the games themselves are pretty terrible. Two of the games did not play, they just loaded to a frozen screen. Of the 120 games on here, only 2 of them are playable - Space Invaders and Frogger. That's it. The rest is trash. Not sure if those two games are worth the $60 I paid, but, it looks cool just sitting next to my cable box.
customer_reviews.author: Magic Mike

customer_reviews.title: Great for Atari fans!
customer_reviews.text: Atari was my first console.l bought the FB8, and loved it. I had no intension of getting another FB! However the FB9 has a SD slot to add games, so i had to get it! So far love it as much as FB8 gold. Will follow up with further review....
customer_reviews.author: Jerome J Burkavage

customer_reviews.title: Great system REAL REVIEW
customer_reviews.text: I bought this with reservations after reading about the controller issues. Yes the pairing instructions are whack and out of order, but it was easy enough to figure out. I have zero lag, which is critical in games like Asteroids. It is missing PacMan but 2600 PacMan sucked anyway. All my old faves are included. I love this system and play it constantly.
customer_reviews.author: C. Sims

customer_reviews.title: wireless controllers won't pair up.
customer_reviews.text: Have tried over & over, many different ways, wireless controllers won't pair up.. Won't even "Flash" like directions claim. directions also suck. Step 2 says to do this & that, but AFTER step 3" ?? how stupid is that. Tried both ways. Doing steps in order 1-2-3-4... & 1-3-2-4... many times won't work at all.
customer_reviews.author: Semutant

customer_reviews.title: Saver your money
customer_reviews.text: The two player mode does not work well and the graphics are so bad you can't make out anything.... save your money and just find an original if your wanting to play these old games...
customer_reviews.author: dmckinleym

customer_reviews.title: I've become a victim of growing older
customer_reviews.text: I grew up with Atari games. I received an Atari console for my 10th birthday. They were incredibly fun to play back then. Unfortunately, now that I'm almost 50, these games which were fun to play as a child are now much, much more challenging than I remember them being back in the early 80s. I had high hopes that I would be playing this every night after getting home from work. Sadly, my hand-eye coordination has diminished to the point where these games were no longer fun to play. I ended up returning the console to Amazon about a week after I bought it.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew

customer_reviews.title: Easy to setup but small 2-player bug
customer_reviews.text: They fixed the controller installation problem others have reported. This was super easy to setup! But on a few of the games (like space invaders) the game will reset when the 2nd player controller is touched. Meaning they cannot be played in two player mode. Most games are fine though, so it’s a weird bug.
customer_reviews.author: A. Price

customer_reviews.title: Worthless!! Doesn’t work!
customer_reviews.text: Don’t buy this!! Controllers don’t work!! We tried several times to get them to pair by following the directions. The lights never blinked per instructions. This was a birthday gift for my husband from our son. Such a disappointment!!
customer_reviews.author: Britta

customer_reviews.title: Almost perfect
customer_reviews.text: Great game system with easy to use controllers and easy set up. Wireless game play is pretty smooth and it looks and feels like the original. My main complaint is that the ultimate version did not offer or come with the paddles. You can buy a lesser version that has them but is missing a few great games. It made me choose and either way I lost out. Could have been planned better. I don't see myself buying another one in any format in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Charles Langston Jr.

customer_reviews.title: Buyer beware...don’t buy this if you might return it
customer_reviews.text: If you are expecting these games to look the same as Atari, don’t buy this product. It looks horrible and you can’t even tell what things are. I bought this for my husband for Christmas and the seller charges crazy fees to refund it.
customer_reviews.author: Tamara L.

customer_reviews.title: Defective Product
customer_reviews.text: This product did not work at all. When it first arrived, we loaded new batteries in the controllers but they didn't work, so we replaced the batteries and the controllers still did not work. The console lit up but the buttons didn't work at all. I am requesting a refund .
customer_reviews.author: A. P. CONTI

customer_reviews.title: Joysticks Didn't Work
customer_reviews.text: Purchased the item brand-new for my Nephew's for Christmas. They didn't test the device for a couple months thinking there would be no issues and found out that neither of the joy-sticks worked. Unable to now return the system for a replacement because it is beyond the return date. Make sure you check this immediately upon delivery for any issues. Also thought that Packman would be loaded onto the system, but it wasn't. Very few games do I actually remember when I was a kid other than "Frogger". Most seemed to be games for a computer and not the actual Atari system.
customer_reviews.author: david j price

customer_reviews.title: Not such a flash back..
customer_reviews.text: I am a classic kind of guy this wasn’t even the same quality I remember playing. It stopped working same day I opened. It kind of reminds me of the Nintendo counsel when you had to blow air into video game cartridge to make it work but there was no way to address this since games are programmed in.
customer_reviews.author: Eduardo Munoz

customer_reviews.title: Great product at a great price
customer_reviews.text: I have had so much fun with. It works perfect and was easy to hook up. I definitely recommend this
customer_reviews.author: lizzy

customer_reviews.title: Had to return
customer_reviews.text: Some of the best games were not, or did not work, for two player. The company returned the money and all is right in the Universe once more.
customer_reviews.author: CreepyAlan Rides

customer_reviews.title: Junk
customer_reviews.text: Paddles do not work on any paddle games. ATGAMES website updates will not apply or even recognize THEIR file in the SD card... WOULD NOT recomend if you get easily frustrated or like 2600 paddle games.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Bishop

customer_reviews.title: I guess somethings are better left alone
customer_reviews.text: This thing is really lame especially coming from someone who used the original. The games loaded are ones that were rarely used if at all with the original and it's missing the most popular ones. Plus the controller is really hard to control.
customer_reviews.author: Dragon

customer_reviews.title: Looks are deceiving
customer_reviews.text: The games look like the original but do NOT play like the originals at. Pitfall was way off as were many others. Very disappointed... Returned it....
customer_reviews.author: RAW Jr

customer_reviews.title: Great memories
customer_reviews.text: Works great. But after you play it for a day. I have not played with it again for over a month. Really brings back memories
customer_reviews.author: C5Galaxy

customer_reviews.title: Tuuuuuuuuuurd
customer_reviews.text: It’s cool that it looks like an Atari. That’s all that’s cool about it. This thing functions like it was made 30 years before the Atari.
customer_reviews.author: jenna pfeiffer

customer_reviews.title: Nostalgia
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for anyone who remembers Atari and wants to share with a new generation.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Has all the classics
customer_reviews.text: Has all the classicsWorks great and is a lot of fun
customer_reviews.author: bob weeks

customer_reviews.title: Junk!
customer_reviews.text: I returned it. What a piece of junk. It’s nothing like the old Atari. Very very cheaply made.
customer_reviews.author: Morgan L.

customer_reviews.title: Hrand
customer_reviews.text: Some of the games don’t work (Burger Time) for one. Instructions to pair controllers could be written better.
customer_reviews.author: Frederick Baker

customer_reviews.title: Missing paddles
customer_reviews.text: Good but missing paddles which older versions came with (what..??)
customer_reviews.author: Zezba

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy...!
customer_reviews.text: The joysticks were unable to be synced to the unit. Troubleshooting was not helpful in remedying the problem. Just ended up returning it! Going to try the wired joysticks next.
customer_reviews.author: Donna

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't work as advertised
customer_reviews.text: Worked once. Then no signal, changed HDMI cables and two different TVs. Still didn't work. I have the original Atari that's 40 plus years old and it works.
customer_reviews.author: Shane Langley

customer_reviews.title: not the original
customer_reviews.text: I am a bit disappointed because I bought game carriages to go with the game set. Which was on the original. But still really fun to play with! But I wish I could play my favorite games.
customer_reviews.author: timothy

customer_reviews.title: Add More Games!
customer_reviews.text: The ability to add more games through the SD card is GREAT!
customer_reviews.author: C Williams

customer_reviews.title: Great video games
customer_reviews.text: I bought 2 video games. Both are working fine and came very fast. But the box of one of them was kneaded e had a hole.
customer_reviews.author: Fabi

customer_reviews.title: Wireless paddles will not sync to game
customer_reviews.text: The paddles do not synch to the game box, I have had this for two months and have not been able to use it once, waste of money
customer_reviews.author: Michael T Schoonmaker

customer_reviews.title: Go retro!
customer_reviews.text: Played for 3 hours Christmas day! The kids probably won't like it but I was reliving my childhood. Games are exactly as I remembered
customer_reviews.author: Leslie A. Smith

customer_reviews.title: Better joystick instructions needed
customer_reviews.text: Good unit but better joystick instructions needed also some good clear instructions on how to add more games would be very help full. with out the internet I would have been lost, I would have given five star if the above was done.
customer_reviews.author: Kel

customer_reviews.title: Atari Flashback 9
customer_reviews.text: It worked perfect right out of the box fun to play brought back a lot of memories
customer_reviews.author: Cal

customer_reviews.title: Paddles for the Atari 9flashback didn’t work.
customer_reviews.text: I bought the Atari flashback 9, and I plugged it into my tv and the picture came up but the paddles wouldn’t work I was so disappointed that when I got it it didn’t even work.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole Hedgpeth

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed!
customer_reviews.text: Doesn’t Work! The joysticks wouldn’t pair up to the console. Very disappointed and a big waste of money!
customer_reviews.author: Andlab

customer_reviews.title: Very Cheaply made.
customer_reviews.text: Would not recommend this item especially for children. The paddles are junk and hard to control. Every move is delayed. Not happy at all.
customer_reviews.author: Cheri

customer_reviews.title: Could not get it running
customer_reviews.text: Upon receiving it would not connect wireless controllers to console. Returned it. I didn’t think it was worth the money
customer_reviews.author: Donna Majchrzak

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product
customer_reviews.text: My grandsons love it! They have wanted one for a while. It’s so easy to pack up and take along. No bulky game cartridges to pack up!
customer_reviews.author: Debra Lee

customer_reviews.title: A terrible disappointment
customer_reviews.text: It was supposed to be new the packaging was a mess and the item was covered in dust.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Atari Flashback 9
customer_reviews.text: Great game easy hookup. Great digital sound. Endless hours of fun

customer_reviews.title: No HDMI cable included
customer_reviews.text: The box states that an HDMI cord is included. Not with mine though.....
customer_reviews.author: Brad

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic!!
customer_reviews.text: It was ordered for my 47 year old son!! Be loved it!!!
customer_reviews.author: BL Burton-Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: Just as advertised hours of time on memory lane! Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Neal Smith

product_meta.title: Atari Flashback 9 Gold - Electronic Games
product_meta.description: Atari flashback 9 Gold with built-in 120 games, including Atari 2600 greatest hits. Comes with two 2.4G wireless Controllers and supports HDMI output (720p HD display). features: frogger.
feature_bullets: 120 games built-in, including Atari 2600 greatest hits
Comes with two 2.4G wireless Controllers and supports HDMI output (720p HD display)

specifications.Customer Reviews: 3.7 out of 5 stars269 ratings3.7 out of 5 stars
specifications.Pricing: The strikethrough price is the List Price. Savings represents a discount off the List Price.
